verbose_text: In fact, evidence of SFB induced Th17 cells could be found not only in the intestine, but also in the spinal chord and spleen, demonstrating that a single intestinal commensal bacterial species is capable of priming immune responses that are extra-intestinal and extend to peripheral lymphoid organs and tissues.
evidence: SFB-induced Th17 cells could be found not only in the intestine, but also in the spinal chord
